meta.name: Donal's Real Time Recipes
meta.description: Join Donal Skehan for a new series Donal's Real Time Recipes, as he takes to the kitchen to make recipes designed with a busy life in mind. Time not on your side? No problem- this series has the solution! From the moment you step into the kitchen to the moment you sit down with a home cooked meal, Donal will arm you with recipes for straight through cooking. No marinating, no oven, no messing –  just fast cooking that will keep you on your feet and make your kitchen work for you. Think simple family favourites where the sauce cooks while the pasta is in the pot, char grilled chicken which sizzles as you prep a simple salad, microwave greens, airfyer tricks while you make magic in the kitchen. In each episode, Donal shares 4 recipes, designed with this clever ethos in mind.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: This episode is all about flexibility,  bold, fast, flavour-packed meals. Whether you're cooking for one, feeding a few, or throwing it all in a pan at the last minute.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Donal shares his favourite Lazy Sunday recipes that feel indulgent, a little bit fancy, but still come together without the stress.

videos.title: Pasta Is Life
videos.overview: To kick off the series, Donal shares his love for a real family favourite - pasta! Using simple tips and flavour hacks, Donal shows us four new ways to prepare pasta.

videos.title: Brilliant Bowls
videos.overview: Donal brings us four internationally inspired-bowls - a Citrus Pork Bowl; a Chicken Katsu Bowl; Tomato & Chickpea Orecchiette Soup; and a Middle Eastern Lamb Bowl.

videos.title: Take Five (or Six!)
videos.overview: Donal takes us through four recipes using minimal ingredients for those days you really don't want to haul home a big shopping list!

videos.title: Food For Friends
videos.overview: Donal has three great recipes that lets you cook up a feast fast, allowing you more time to spend with friends - Pork Belly; Thai Fish & Veggie Stew; and Lamb Mince Flatbreads.

videos.title: One Dish Dinners
videos.overview: For those evenings you want to be anywhere but washing lots of pots after dinner, Donal has four recipes that are one pan wonders.

videos.title: Nostalgic Nights In
videos.overview: Taking inspiration from the recipes he grew up with, Donal shares some firm family favourites that would be a hit in any household.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Donal Skehan brings his signature no-fuss cooking home, just in time for busy weeknights.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: This week Donal is showing how a little time in the kitchen today means stress-free meals for days.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: The Pantry Raid - When the fridge is looking bare, Donal turns to the pantry for inspiration.
